channel.title: Save All command [REQ]
channel.description: Yeah, just requesting a save all command, i do have an automatic saver, but just in case i wanna make it so i can save all, or even give the players to have it, cuz i have command buttons ( thx alot fasga ) and i wanna add a save button to it plz help. I coulda prolly done it myself and if no1 helps me ill prolly end up doin some searchin lol. thx alot for ne help :)
